text: Hagi Senakeripiga kagra ontahi'nane, korapa ana zana forera osu'nege'na, Nagra ru knafi huvame hunte'noa zamofo menina eriama nehu'na hankavea negamugenka, kagra hankave nentake have keginama hugagi'naza ranra kumatmina, hara huzmagaterankeno, have kegina zamimo'a fragu vaziramino mopafina hihi huno mareri'ne.
